response.headline: Cow tteokbokki restaurant in Seoul's Goyang-si district recommended as vegan dining spot
response.summary: Cow tteokbokki (카우떡볶이) located in Goyang-si, Seoul is featured as one of two favorite vegan spots. The restaurant has distinctive cow-themed branding with blue and yellow decor.
